attributes.action: Ensure all staff employed at a residential care home for people with learning disabilities are fully qualified and crb checked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Often homes for people with learning disabilities are not adequately staffed and are staffed by people with no qualifications - this includes agency staff who are often used and are clearly not qualified - measures should be put in place for all staff to be fully qualified in this field of work and with approved qualifications from a governing body in the uk only - no qualifications - no job at a care home for people with learning disabilities - it's simple.Any one from abroad who is qualified in their country of origin must be asked to sit tests and examinations to gain the recognised qualification in the UK.
 Measures must be put in place to protect members of the community living in the care home who are dependent and vulnerable - staff must have documentary proof of qualifications that are recognised in the UK and checkable.
